document_title: Iritis of the ciliary body: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content:
Ciliary iridocyclitis often cannot be prevented because the cause is unknown. However, in people with autoimmune diseases, taking good care of the condition can prevent the occurrence of iritis.
Although iridocyclitis is not dangerous, it causes discomfort and reduced vision. To prevent serious complications, when people see signs of eye abnormalities, they should go to the Ophthalmology Department for early examination and timely treatment.
